T02D1975:145a-1: ma hirsh'a nan ya s'a dha nam /
T02D1975:145a-3: ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1975:145a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma hirsh'a zhal can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1975:145a-5: gus pas bla ma dang ni de rjes gshin rje
T02D1975:145a-6: gshed po 'jam pa'i mchog / sgyu ma'i bdag nyid
T02D1975:145a-7: yan lag bde bas rgyas pa gzhan gyi don 'jug
T02D1975:145a-8: pa // gri gug la sogs mtshan ma bsnams shing /
T02D1975:145a-9: khro ba dang bcas mtshungs pa med //
T02D1975:145a-10: zhal dgu yis ni 'jigs pa sel byed de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D1975:145a-11: gshin rje 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs kyis //
T02D1975:145a-12: blo ldan de nyid 'dod pa gang //
T02D1975:145a-13: dbang bskur la sogs thob pa dag / de yi sgrub thabs rim pa 'di //
T02D1975:145a-14: byis pa rnams kyis rtogs phyir dang //
T02D1975:145a-15: mnyam pas dran pa'i phyir dang ni //
T02D1975:145a-16: mchog rnams byis pa'i ngag la yang //
T02D1975:145a-17: mgu ba bskyed phyir bri bar bya //
T02D1975:145a-18: de nas yang dag rab bshad bya //
T02D1975:145a-19: rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1975:145a-20: lha nyid dag ni thams cad kun //
T02D1975:145a-22: de la dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas shig tu gnas nas /
T02D1975:145a-23: sgrub pa'i thabs brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1975:145a-24: de nas gnas ni brjod par bya ste /
T02D1975:145a-25: dur khrod dang chu bo'i dogs dang /
T02D1975:145a-36: grong la sogs pa'i gnas nas /
T02D1975:145a-37: 'dir rdo rje 'jigs byed chen por dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1975:145a-39: tshul khrims la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1975:145b-0: sems can gyi don @145b la brtson pa byams pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1975:145b-1: dad pa dang thos pas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1975:145b-2: kha la sogs pa dag par byed pa'i snying rje
T02D1975:145b-3: can de bde bar 'jam pa ro la sogs pa'i
T02D1975:145b-5: rang gi snying gar padma las dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1975:145b-7: de'i steng du yi ge dh'i:'i rnam pa blta'o //
T02D1975:145b-8: de nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs bcu mtha'
T02D1975:145b-9: yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
T02D1975:145b-10: med pa'i mthar thug par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1975:145b-11: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1975:145b-13: khro bo la sogs pa rnams bskul te /
T02D1975:145b-14: bkug nas mdun du yang dag par bzhugs par byas la /
T02D1975:145b-15: bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel bar bya ba'i don du /
T02D1975:145b-16: mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1975:145b-17: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1975:145b-18: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D1975:145b-19: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1975:145b-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1975:145b-22: byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa yang byas la /
T02D1975:145b-23: de nas stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T02D1975:145b-24: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1975:145b-25: de nas sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1975:145b-27: / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i dbus su /
T02D1975:145b-28: yi ge yam las rdzogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor du ba'i rnam pa can bsam mo //
T02D1975:145b-29: de'i steng du dbyangs yig dang po las rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
T02D1975:145b-30: de'i steng du yi ge dh'i: las 'jam dpal 'og
T02D1975:145b-31: nas bshad pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can skad cig gis
T02D1975:145b-32: bskyed la / de'i thugs kar aa las rdzogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam te /
T02D1975:145b-33: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'od zer byung ste /
T02D1975:145b-34: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug pa na
T02D1975:145b-35: gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'od
T02D1975:145b-36: zer gyis bskul nas bkug ste nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1975:145b-37: de nyid la zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1975:145b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de nyid ro gcig par gyur te /
T02D1975:145b-40: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1975:146a-1: ba dpag tshad brgya stong khyab pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1975:146a-2: de'i steng du h'um nag po kha dog rnam pa lnga'i 'od zer dang ldan pa bltas la /
T02D1975:146a-3: de nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsal bar
T02D1975:146a-4: byas nas yang h'um de nyid la bsam par bya'o
T02D1975:146a-5: // de nyid gyur pa las kha gyen du phyogs
T02D1975:146a-6: pa'i rdo rje chen po mdog nag po 'od zer
T02D1975:146a-8: de nas rdo rje phra mo'i rnam pa can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1975:146a-9: khro bo dang rig pa'i lha mo dang bcas pa /
T02D1975:146a-10: nam mkha'i khams na til gyi gang bu bzhin nyi ma la gnas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1975:146a-11: de la gnas pa sangs rgyas la sogs pas sems
T02D1975:146a-12: can yongs su smin par byas shing gdul bya so
T02D1975:146a-13: sor byang chub la bkod de /
T02D1975:146a-14: yang de dag nyid dang lhan cig tu /
T02D1975:146a-16: rdo rje'i gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam pa can du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1975:146a-17: rdo rje'i gzugs de nyid zhal dgu pa ma he'i
T02D1975:146a-18: gzugs 'jig pa'i dus kyi bskal ba'i me lta bu'i
T02D1975:146a-19: 'od can rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po /
T02D1975:146a-20: khams gsum za bar nus pa /
T02D1975:146a-22: ha ha zer zhing lce 'dril ba rnam par bsgyur ba'i mthar 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer byed pa /
T02D1975:146a-23: 'jigs pa'i smin ma dang spyan can ;
T02D1975:146a-24: 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa mi'i khrag dang /
T02D1975:146a-27: tshil bu dang rkang rnams gsol ba /
T02D1975:146a-28: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la sogs pa'i lha la sdigs mdzub byed pa /
T02D1975:146a-29: brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /
T02D1975:146a-30: zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1975:146a-31: gzhon nu nag po la sogs pa kha thur du bltas la zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan pa /
T02D1975:146a-32: thod pa las byas pa'i thod can /
T02D1975:146a-34: thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1975:146a-36: gcer bu'i gzugs can mtshan ma gyen du bsgreng pa /
T02D1975:146a-37: g-yon brkyang ba gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D1975:146a-39: 'jigs par byed pa chen po phem ka ra'i sgra 'byin pa /
T02D1975:146a-40: phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02D1975:146a-41: glang po'i pags pa rlon pa bsnams pa /
T02D1975:146a-42: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i zhal can /
T02D1975:146a-43: de la phyag g-yas kyi dang po na gri gug / gnyis pa na mtshon rtse gcig pa /
T02D1975:146b-8: bcu gcig pa na kha tv'am ga /
T02D1975:146b-10: bcu gsum pa na rdo rje /
T02D1975:146b-11: bcu bzhi pa na rdo rje'i tho ba /
T02D1975:146b-12: bco lnga pa na ral gri /
T02D1975:146b-13: bcu drug pa na da ma ru'o //
T02D1975:146b-14: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i phyag dang po na thod pa /
T02D1975:146b-23: bcu pa na dur khrod kyi ras /
T02D1975:146b-24: bcu gcig pa na mdung gis phug pa'i skyes bu /
T02D1975:146b-25: bcu gnyis pa na me thab /
T02D1975:146b-26: bcu gsum pa na ro'i snod /
T02D1975:146b-27: bcu bzhi pa na sdigs mdzub /
T02D1975:146b-28: bco lnga pa na ba dan rtse gsum pa /
T02D1975:146b-29: bcu drug pa na rlung gi ras so //
T02D1975:146b-30: phyag gnyis dag gis glang po che'i pags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1975:146b-31: de bzhin du g-yas kyi zhabs dang po la mi /
T02D1975:146b-37: bdun pa na lug / brgyad pa na ce sbyang ngo //
T02D1975:146b-38: g-yon gyi zhabs dang po na bya rgod /
T02D1975:146b-40: gsum pa na bya rog / bzhi pa na ne tso /
T02D1975:146b-42: drug pa na bya rgod chen po /
T02D1975:146b-45: de la rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po /
T02D1975:146b-46: zhal dang po ni ma he'i gdong shin tu gnag pa /
T02D1975:146b-48: rva'i g-yas gsum ni nag po dang dmar po dang ser po ste /
T02D1975:146b-50: rva'i g-yon gyi zhal gsum ni ;
T02D1975:146b-51: dkar po dang du ba'i mdog dang nag po ste /
T02D1975:146b-52: shin tu khros shing gtsigs pa'i zhal rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1975:146b-53: rva'i logs kyi dbus kyi zhal dmar po shin tu khros pa khrag 'dzag pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1975:146b-54: de'i steng gi zhal cung zad ser ba /
T02D1975:146b-55: cung zad khros pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1975:146b-57: zhal thams cad ni spyan gsum par bsams te /
T02D1975:146b-59: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas /
T02D1975:146b-60: rtag tu de nyid la sbyor bas bdag nyid dpal
T02D1975:146b-61: chen po ma hirsha'i zhal gyi bdag nyid do zhes
T02D1975:147a-1: bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams bsams te /
T02D1975:147a-2: rang gi sngags kyi yi ge 'bar ba rnam par dgod do //
T02D1975:147a-3: de'i rjes su yid nang du chud pas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-4: de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1975:147a-5: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1975:147a-7: / aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D1975:147a-18: sngags 'dis rnal 'byor ba'i las thams cad thogs pa med par byed do //
T02D1975:147a-19: dur khrod la sogs par gnas te rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-20: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bza' bar bya ste /
T02D1975:147a-21: de yis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1975:147a-22: gzhan yang sgron ma chen po la sogs pa bza'
T02D1975:147a-23: zhing nub mo rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor bas
T02D1975:147a-24: rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-25: bzlas pa byas pa'i sngags pas las thams cad byed cing 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1975:147a-26: bsam gtan la brtan pa'i sngags pas shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-27: ma dad pa dang mi mos pa dang /
T02D1975:147a-28: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la mi gtad cing res 'ga' yang rgyud sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-29: sngags kyang res 'ga' sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-30: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor dang bsam gtan ni brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-31: sngags chung ma dang g-yog pos ma tshor bar ro //
T02D1975:147a-33: bris sku mdun du yang mi bstan /
T02D1975:147a-34: bris sku gsang la gzung ngo //
T02D1975:147a-35: rgyud 'di'i sbyor ba gang su'i drung du yang mi brjod do //
T02D1975:147a-36: gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
T02D1975:147a-37: po dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis za ste dam
T02D1975:147a-39: de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D1975:147a-40: yang na dam tshig mi phyed pa rtog pa dang
T02D1975:147a-41: bral ba la bstan pa'i brtul zhugs dpa' bo dang
T02D1975:147a-42: / bla ma la gus pa dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gcig tu gnas pa /
T02D1975:147a-43: sngags sbed pa dang khro ba med pa /
T02D1975:147b-1: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la gus pa /
T02D1975:147b-2: snying rje chen po la sogs pas yid rtog pa dang bral ba /
T02D1975:147b-3: legs par brtag pa la legs par sems pa /
T02D1975:147b-4: de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs
T02D1975:147b-5: byed chen po'i sgrub thabs sbyin par gzhan du gal
T02D1975:147b-7: slob ma dang bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do //
T02D1975:147b-8: 'jig rten 'dir yang 'jigs pa chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1975:147b-9: 'jig rten pha rol tu yang dmyal bar 'gro ste /
T02D1975:147b-10: dam tshig nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1975:147b-11: 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs chu srid 'khrus shing rmugs dang gnyid sogs dbu ba can //
T02D1975:147b-12: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skye dang 'chi ba'i dpa' klong zab mo 'jigs pa las sgrol ba //
T02D1975:147b-13: dpal ldan gshin rje bde ba'i rang bzhin sgrub thabs byas pas skye 'gro kun //
T02D1975:147b-14: bdag 'bad pa yi bsod nams rnyed pa des 'dir 'jig rten de yi go 'phang grub par shog //
T02D1975:147b-15: / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud kyi
T02D1975:147b-16: sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1975:147b-18: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam par snang mdzad srung ba'i zhabs dang /
